strapiEvent.name: Garden Magic: Single Day Camp
strapiEvent.description:
Encourage your kids’ imaginations by signing them up for Garden Magic: Single-Day Camp at the Botanical Garden of the Ozarks on July 6 or 7, from 8:30a-3:30p.

  • Hands-on learning: Offering a range of activities designed for ages 5 to 8, campers will tap into their creativity by building with natural materials, experimenting in the outdoor mud kitchen, building a take-home “fairy house” or “gnome home,” and more.
  • Natural education: This camp promises to be a day filled with wonder and discovery and aims to nurture creativity, inspire a love for nature, and encourage time spent outdoors!

Registration is $80 with a $15 discount for BGO members. Sign up HERE.
